title: German-style pretzels
ingredients: ['7g active dry yeast', '2 tablespoons brown soft sugar', '1 1/8 teaspoons salt', '350ml warm water (45 degrees C)', '375g plain flour', '135g strong white bread flour', '475ml warm water (45 degrees C)', '2 tablespoons bicarbonate of soda', '2 tablespoons butter, melted', '2 tablespoons coarse salt']
